description: Jitters physics objects touching the ground. Jitter forces are calculated in such a way as to displace the object upwards some height between min and max displacement at each point of contact with the ground.

params.name: center
description: The world position of the center of the cylinder.

params.name: outer radius
description: The radius beyond which the displacement is zero.

params.name: inner radius
description: The radius within which the displacement is maximum.

params.name: min displacement
description: Approximate minimum distance each contact point will be displaced.

params.name: max displacement
description: Approximate maximum distance each contact point will be displaced.
